text: Zaya Avdysh () was a Soviet football player and Ukrainian football coach of Assyrian ethnic origin and the president of FC Polissya Zhytomyr in 1999–2004. Zaya was a brother of another football player and later a football referee Valeriy Avdysh. ==External links== * Zaya Avdysh at the footballfacts.ru Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Footballers from Kyiv Category:Ukrainian people of Assyrian descent Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr players Category:Vakhsh Qurghonteppa players Category:FC Sakhalin Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk players Category:FC Vostok players Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr managers Category:FC Temp Shepetivka managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Merited Coaches of Ukraine Category:Assyrian sportspeople Category:Association football defenders Category:Assyrian footballers
title: Zaya Avdysh
